statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address, kyc_status, compliance_record FROM KYC_Compliance;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, customer_id, kyc_status FROM KYC_Compliance;
SELECT * FROM KYC_Compliance WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM KYC_Compliance WHERE kyc_status = 'Active';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, compliance_record FROM KYC_Compliance WHERE customer_id > 3;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM KYC_Compliance ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, kyc_status FROM KYC_Compliance WHERE kyc_status='Verified';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM KYC_Compliance WHERE customer_address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM KYC_Compliance WHERE LENGTH(compliance_record) > 500;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, kyc_status FROM KYC_Compliance WHERE kyc_status='Pending' ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM kyc_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM kyc_information WHERE kyc_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, date_of_birth, address FROM kyc_information WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, address, kyc_status FROM kyc_information ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT customer_name, date_of_birth FROM kyc_information WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM kyc_information WHERE kyc_status = TRUE ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM kyc_information WHERE date_of_birth <= '1990-01-01';

SELECT customer_name, event_description FROM kyc_information JOIN compliance_records ON kyc_information.customer_id = compliance_records.customer_id WHERE compliance_records.compliance_status = FALSE;

SELECT kyc_information.customer_id, compliance_records.record_id, compliance_records.event_description FROM kyc_information JOIN compliance_records ON kyc_information.customer_id = compliance_records.customer_id WHERE kyc_information.date_of_birth >= '1980-01-01';
SELECT * FROM kyc_information;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, nationality FROM kyc_information WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT kyc_id, full_name, address FROM kyc_information ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT record_id, status, issue_date FROM compliance_records WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_type, reporting_date FROM regulatory_reports ORDER BY reporting_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM kyc_information;
SELECT kyc_id, full_name, address FROM kyc_information WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT r.report_type, r.reporting_date, c.status FROM regulatory_reports r JOIN compliance_records c ON r.record_id = c.record_id;
SELECT kyc_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM kyc_information WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';

SELECT c.status, r.report_type, k.full_name FROM compliance_records c JOIN regulatory_reports r ON c.record_id = r.record_id JOIN kyc_information k ON c.kyc_id = k.kyc_id ORDER BY r.reporting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM kyc_information
SELECT full_name, address FROM kyc_information
SELECT user_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM kyc_information WHERE kyc_verified = true
SELECT * FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_date DESC
SELECT user_id, record_type, record_date FROM compliance_records WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM kyc_information;
SELECT full_name, address FROM kyc_information WHERE kyc_verified = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM kyc_information WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, record_description FROM compliance_records WHERE record_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM kyc_information WHERE user_id = '3f9c5e11-0dea-4c38-8c2c-0d74c99a3623';
SELECT full_name, dob FROM kyc_information WHERE kyc_status = TRUE ORDER BY full_name;
SELECT full_name, address FROM kyc_information WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, details FROM compliance_records WHERE user_id = 'b173583e-40d8-4b9e-a16c-1d4eec0d85e5';
SELECT * FROM kyc_information WHERE kyc_status = TRUE;
SELECT full_name, address FROM kyc_information WHERE dob IS NOT NULL AND address ILIKE '%USA%';
SELECT user_id, dob, kyc_status FROM kyc_information WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT id, full_name, dob, address, kyc_status FROM kyc_information WHERE full_name ILIKE '%Smith%' OR full_name ILIKE '%Johnson%' ORDER BY full_name ASC;

SELECT kyc_information.full_name, compliance_records.record_date, compliance_records.details FROM kyc_information INNER JOIN compliance_records ON kyc_information.user_id = compliance_records.user_id WHERE compliance_records.compliance_status = TRUE;
